abstract: Herbert A. Allen, the head of the investment bank Allen & Company, was accused in a lawsuit of forging his dying cousin's signature to protect a family ranch.
snippet: Herbert A. Allen, the head of the investment bank Allen & Company, was accused in a lawsuit of forging his dying cousin's signature to protect a family ranch.

headline.main: Lawsuit Accuses Head of Allen & Co. of Forgery
headline.print_headline: In Lawsuit, Bank Chief Is Accused Of Forgery
